outputs.output_descr:
The project's five (5) short-term outcomes and the corollary outputs to be produced, as well as the major activities are as follows:

Short Term Outcome 1 (STO1), "Climate/Disaster risks of target cities/municipalities assessed", characterizes the vulnerabilities of priority cities and municipalities in selected regions of the Philippines to natural hazards and climate change.This will be attained by undertaking the following: 1.) Multi-hazard and socioeconomic profiling of target areas; 2.) Risk mapping of target areas; and 3.) Vulnerability and Adaptation assessments of target sites. Attainment of Short Term Outcome 2 (STO2), "Priority climate adaptation and disaster risk mitigation actions developed", involves formulation of "no regrets" risk reduction and climate adaptation measures such as contingency planning and mobilization, Community-based and Managed Early Warning Systems (CBMEWS) ; and, massive information and education campaigns. Short Term Outcome 3 (STO3), "Climate/Disaster risk management mainstreamed into the target cities'/municipalities' planning and regulatory processes", will be achieved by enhancing the competencies of local government planners and key partners, especially the academe, to enable them to produce risk-based comprehensive land use and development plans and regulatory processes. Short Term Outcome 4 (STO- 4), "Socio-economic resilience of the poor and most vulnerable in target areas developed", is expected to be realized by developing/strengthening the socioeconomic resilience of vulnerable communities through such mechanisms as climate resilient livelihoods and risk sharing/transfer options such as insurance, which will enable them to immediately bounce back when hit by natural disasters. Short Term Outcome 5 (STO-5),"Local knowledge management (KM) systems established in selected target areas", involves transformation of process learnings into normative tools and forms that would contribute to the over-all knowledge base on climate change adaptation and disaster risk management in the Philippines

project_descr: Project ReBUILD: Resilience Capacity Building for Cities and Municipalities to Reduce Disaster Risks from Climate Change and Natural Hazards, Phase 1
project_title: Project ReBUILD: Resilience Capacity Building for Cities
